out-of-date.translation[0].definitions[0: if information is out-of-date, it is not recent and may no longer be correct
The information in the tourist guide is already out-of-date.
out-of-date.translation[0].definitions[1: if something is out-of-date, it is no longer considered useful or effective, because something more modern exists
Their manufacturing methods are hopelessly out-of-date.
out-of-date.translation[0].definitions[2: an official document that is out-of-date cannot be used because the period of time for which it was effective has finished
out-of-date.translation[1].definitions[0: things that are out-of-date are old, and therefore cannot be used or are not correct, fashionable etc
complaints about out-of-date information used by credit bureaus
These regulations are totally out-of-date in todayâ€™s worldwide marketplace.
